asana.name: Surya Namaskara A
asana.step: Inhale, lift the arms up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up only.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump forward, head up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, lift the arms up.

asana.name: Surya Namaskara B
asana.step: Inhale, lift the arms up and bend knees to utkatasana
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, right foot forward to Warrior 1.
Exhale, hands down, step back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, left foot forward to Warrior 1.
Exhale, hands down, step back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump forward, head up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, hands up, bent knees, utkatasana.

asana.name: Padangusthasana
asana.step: Spread the feet half a foot apart.
Inhale, catch the big toes, head up.
Exhale, take the head between the legs.
Inhale, lift the head up.

asana.name: Padahastasana
asana.step: Inhale, place the palms under the feet, head up.
Exhale, take the head between the legs.
Inhale, head up,

asana.name: Utthita Trikonasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump to the right side, legs three feet apart, arms out.
Exhale, pivot right to catch the right big toe, look up
Inhale, come up.
Exhale, pivot left to catch the left big toe, look up
Inhale, come up, arms out

asana.name: Utthita Trikonasana B
asana.step: Exhale, twist the body to the right side, place the left hand next to the right foot.
Inhale, come up.
Exhale, twist the body to the left side. Place the right hand next to the left foot.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Utthita Parsvakonasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump to the right side with the legs five feet apart and arms out.
Exhale, bend the right knee, place the right hand outside the right foot, reach the left arm over the head.
Inhale, come up.
Exhale, bend the left knee, place the left hand outside the left foot, reach the right arm over the head.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Utthita Parsvakonasana B
asana.step: Exhale, bend the right knee, twist the body, and place the left hand outside the right foot.
Inhale, come up.
Exhale, bend the left knee, twist the body, and place the right hand outside the left foot.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Prasarita Padottanasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump to the right side, place the hands on the waist.
Exhale, place the hands on the floor between the feet. Inhale and lift the head up.
Exhale, place the head on the floor.
Inhale, lift the head only, keep the hands on the floor.
Inhale, hands on waist, come up.

asana.name: Prasarita Padottanasana B
asana.step: Inhale, spread the arms out to the side.
Exhale, place the hands on the waist.
Exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Prasarita Padottanasana C
asana.step: Inhale, spread the arms out to the side.
Exhale, clasp hands behind the back.
Exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet and reach the hands toward the floor.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Prasarita Padottanasana D
asana.step: Inhale, place the hands on the waist.
Exhale, catch the big toes. Inhale, lift the head.
Exhale, place the head on the floor between the feet.
Inhale, lift the head only.
Inhale, hands to waist, come up.

asana.name: Parsvottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump to the right side with the feet three feet apart, palms together behind back
Exhale, bend forward front leg straight.
Inhale, come up. Turn to the left side.
Exhale, bend forward, leg straight.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Utthita Hasta Padangusthasana
asana.step: Inhale, catch the right big toe with the right hand, keep both legs straight.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, take the leg to the right side, look to the left
Inhale, bring the leg back to the front.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head. Place both hands on the waist.
Inhale, catch the left big toe with the left hand, keep both legs straight.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, take the leg to the left side, look to the right
Inhale, bring the leg to the front.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head. Place the hands on the waist.

asana.name: Ardha Baddha Padmottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, take the right leg into half padmasana, bind.
Exhale, bend forward, place the left hand next to the left foot.
Inhale, head up only.
Inhale, come up.
Exhale, release the right leg.
Inhale, take the left leg into half padmasana, bind.
Exhale, bend forward, place the right hand next to the right foot.
Breath five times.
Inhale, head up only.
Inhale, come up.

asana.name: Utkatasana
asana.step: Inhale, hands up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump the feet forward to the hands, bend the legs, take the arms up to utkatasana
Inhale, hands down, lift up.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Virabhadrasana
asana.step: Inhale, step the right leg forward and take the arms up to Virabhadrasana 1
Exhale, turn to the left side.
Exhale, spread the arms to the side (Virabhadrasana 2).
Exhale, turn to the right side.
Inhale, place both hands down beside the front foot, lift the legs up.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Dandasana
asana.step: Inhale. Jump through to seated, straighten the legs, keep the hands next to the hips, tuck the chin.

asana.name: Paschimottanasana A
asana.step: Inhale, catch the big toes and lift the head up.
Exhale, touch the head or chin to the knees.
Inhale, head up.

asana.name: Paschimottanasana B or D
asana.step: Inhale, lock the hands around the feet, lift the head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
Inhale, head up.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Purvottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, straighten the legs.
Inhale, lift the hips up.
Exhale, come down.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Ardha Baddha Padma Paschimottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, right leg into half padmasana, bind. Left hand to left foot.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated, left leg into half padmasana, bind. Right hand to right foot.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Triyanga Mukha Eka Pada Paschimottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through with right leg folded back. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through with left leg folded back. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Janu Sirsasana A
asana.step: Jump through to seated, fold the right leg to the side. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated, fold the left leg to the side. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Janu Sirsasana B
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, sit on right heel. Catch the left foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated, sit on left heel. Catch the right foot with both hands, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Janu Sirsasana C
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, right foot in with the heel up. Catch the left foot, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated, left foot in with the heel up. Catch the right foot, head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Maricasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, bend the right knee, bend forward, and bind.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated, bend the left knee, bend forward, and bind.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Maricasana B
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Take the left leg into half padmasana, bend the right knee, bend forward, and bind.
Exhale, touch the nose or chin to the floor.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Take the right leg into half padmasana, bend the left knee, bend forward, and bind.
Exhale, touch the nose or chin to the floor.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift up with crossed legs.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Maricasana C
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Bend the right knee, twist right, and bind.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Bend the left knee, twist left, and bind.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Maricasana D
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Take the left leg into half padmasana, twist right, and bind.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Take the right leg into half padmasana, twist left, and bind.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Navasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, lower down.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, lower down.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, lower down.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, lower down.
Inhale, jump through to seated. Legs up, arms straight.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, lower down.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Bhujapidasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump and wrap the legs around the arms. Lock the feet in front of you with the right on top of the left.
Exhale, place the head or chin on the floor.
Inhale, lift the head or chin up off the floor.
Inhale, take bakasana.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Kurmasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump and place the legs around the arms. Go down and straighten the arms and legs.

asana.name: Supta Kurmasana
asana.step: Exhale, take the arms behind the back and lock the hands.
Inhale, cross the feet, and take them behind the head. The right leg should be on top of the left.
Inhale, lift up.
Inhale, take the legs to bakasana position.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Garbha Pindasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated.
Inhale, take padmasana position, thread the arms through the legs, place the hands over the ears.
Exhale, roll down onto the back.
Exhale, roll down onto the back.
Exhale, roll down onto the back.
Exhale, roll down onto the back.
Exhale, roll down onto the back.

asana.name: Kukkutasana
asana.step: Inhale, lift up and balance.
Inhale, lift up in padmasana or with crossed legs.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Baddha Konasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Pull your heels in.
Exhale, touch the chin on the floor.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, touch the head to the toes.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Upavistha Konasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated. Spread the legs, catch the heels with the hands, and lift the head up.
Exhale, touch the chin to the floor.

asana.name: Upavistha Konasana B
asana.step: Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift both of the legs up and balance.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Supta Konasana
asana.step: Jump through to seated and lie down.
Inhale, take both legs back over the head, spread the legs, and catch the big toes.
Inhale, roll up while holding the toes.
Inhale, lift the head up only.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Supta Padangusthasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
Inhale, catch the right big toe with the right hand while keeping both legs straight.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lower the head only.
Exhale, take the right leg to the right side, look to the left.
Inhale, bring the right leg back to the center.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lower the head only.
Exhale, release the right toe and lower the right leg to the floor.
Inhale, catch the left big toe with the left hand while keeping both legs straight.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lower the head to the floor.
Exhale, take the left leg to the left side, look to the right.
Inhale, bring the left leg back to center.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knee.
Inhale, lower the head only.
Exhale, release the left toe and lower the left leg to the floor.
Inhale, take the feet over the head and take cakrasana back into chaturanga dandasana.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Ubhaya Padangusthasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated, lie down.
Inhale, bring both legs over the head, catch the big toes.
Inhale, roll up with straight legs and look up.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Urdhva Mukha Paschimottanasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
Inhale, bring both legs over the head, catch the heels.
Inhale, roll up with straight legs.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
Inhale, straighten the arms, head back, exhale.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Setthu Bandhasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
Exhale, bend the knees slightly with the heels together, take back the head, and cross the arms over the chest.
Inhale, lift the hips off the floor.
Exhale, come down.
Inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana, roll back into chaturanga dandasana.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Urdhva Dhanurasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
Exhale, bend the knees, take the hands back behind the shoulders.
Inhale, lift the body up off the floor.
Exhale, come down to the floor. Repeat two to four more times.
Inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana. roll back into chaturanga dandasana.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Paschimottanasana
asana.step: Jump through to seated and straighten the legs.
Inhale, lock the hands around the feet and lift the head up.
Exhale, touch the head or chin to the knees.
Inhale, head up.
Inhale, lift.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Salamba Sarvangasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated and lie down.
Inhale, lift the legs straight up.

asana.name: Halasana
asana.step: Exhale, lower the legs over the head and touch the toes to the floor.

asana.name: Karnapidasana
asana.step: Exhale, bend the knees around the head and press them to the ears.

asana.name: Urdhva Padmasana
asana.step: Inhale, lift the legs up and take padmasana. Place the hands on the knees.

asana.name: Pindasana
asana.step: Inhale, wrap the arms around padmasana and lock the hands.

asana.name: Matsyasana
asana.step: Exhale, lower padmasana to the floor, arch back, top of head on floor.

asana.name: Uttana Padasana
asana.step: Exhale, straighten lift the legs and arms, and press the hands together.
Inhale, take the feet back over the head and cakrasana, roll back to chaturanga dandasana.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Sirsasana
asana.step: Inhale, take sirsasana position.
Inhale, lift the legs straight up.
Exhale, lower the legs half way, point the toes.
Exhale, come down, sit on the heels with the head remaining down.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Baddha Padmasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through to seated.
Inhale, take padmasana position, wrap the left arm and then the right around to bind.

asana.name: Yoga Mudra
asana.step: Exhale, touch the chin to the floor.

asana.name: Padmasana
asana.step: Inhale, come up. Straighten the arms and breathe deeply with sound.

asana.name: Utpluthih
asana.step: Inhale, lift up and balance.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump to standing.
Exhale, touch the chin to the knees.
Samasthitih.

asana.name: Pasasana
asana.step: Inhale, hands up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, jump back.
Inhale, push up.
Exhale, push back.
Inhale, jump to crouch, right arm wraps to bind.
Inhale, left arm wraps to bind.
Inhale, lift legs up, balance on straight arms.
Exhale, drop to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Krounshasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through, right leg bent beside right hip, left leg up, head up.
Exhale, touch your chin to shin, look toward toes.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale.
Inhale, lift legs up, balance on straight arms.
Exhale, drop back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Jump through to left side position, toes point, head up.
Exhale, touch your chin to chin, look toward toes.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale.
Inhale, lift legs up, balance on straight arms.
Drop back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Shalabhasana
asana.step: Inhale, high plank.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, tops of hands to mat beside hips, feet and chest up.
Inhale, hands palms down at waist, keep feet and chest up.
Exhale.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Bhekasana
asana.step: Inhale to chaturanga.
Exhale, grab tops of feet and push down, elbows up, head up.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Dhanurasana
asana.step: Inhale, high plank.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, lift feet off floor.
Exhale, grasp ankles, arch upwards.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Parshva Dhanurasana
asana.step: Inhale, high plank.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, grasp ankles, arch upwards.
Exhale, roll to right side, knees together.
Inhale, roll back to center.
Exhale, roll to left side.
Inhale, roll back to center.
Exhale.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Ustrasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump to kneeling, hands on hips.
Exhale, arch back, hands on heels.
Inhale, come back up, hands on hips.
Exhale.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Laghuvajrasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump to kneeling, hands on hips.
Exhale, arch back, hands on ankles, top of head to floor.
Inhale, come back up, hands on hips.
Exhale.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Kapotasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump to kneeling, hands on hips.
Exhale, arch back, hands through prayer to grasp ankles, elbows on floor, head back to floor.
Inhale, push up, hands on floor, arms straight, head off floor.
Inhale, come back up, hands on hips.
Exhale.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Supta Vadrasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through, straight legs, sit down.
Exhale, baddha padmasana.
Inhale.
Exhale, lean back, head to floor, hold for five breaths.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, one.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, two.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, three.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, four.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, five.
Inhale, sit up.
Exhale, arch back, hold for five breaths.
Inhale, sit back up to baddha padmasana.
Inhale, lift up, balance on straight arms.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Bakasana A
asana.step: Inhale, push forward, straight arms, legs bent in air.
Exhale, squat down.
Inhale, rise to position, head up.
Exhale.
Inhale.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Bakasana B
asana.step: Inhale, jump to Bakasana.
Exhale.
Inhale, lift legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Bharadvajasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through, dandasana.
Exhale, fold left leg back, right leg lotus.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through, dandasana.
Exhale, fold right leg back, left leg lotus.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Ardha Matsyendrasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump through, dandasana.
Exhale, left leg under and right leg over.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump through, dandasana.
Exhale, right leg under, left over.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Eka Pada Sirsasana
asana.step: Jump through, right foot behind head.
Exhale, touch your chin to shin.
Inhale, look up, hands in prayer.
Exhale, hands to floor.
Inhale, swing leg up.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, legs up, left leg over arm.
Exhale, sit down, left foot behind head.
Inhale, hand in prayer.
Exhale, chin to shin.
Inhale, sit up, hands in prayer.
Exhale.
Inhale, lift up, bend legs in air.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Dvi Pada Sirsasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward, bend legs in the air.
Exhale, bring legs to Tittibhasana, and put feet behind head, hands in prayer.
Inhale, plance hands on floor.
Exhale, lift up with feet behind head.
Inhale, straighten legs to Tittibhasana.
Exhale, legs to Bakasana.
Inhale, legs up.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Yoga Nidrasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward, feet up.
Exhale, swing through, lay down.
Inhale, lift both legs.
Exhale, left, then right foot behind head.
Inhale, cakrasana.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Tittibhasana
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward, feet up.
Exhale, place straight legs over upper arms.
Exhale, place feet on floor, head between legs, lock arms around back.
Inhale, head up and take five steps.
One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
Walk back.
One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
Close your feet, Lock back your hands. head down, straight knees.
Inhale, legs up to Tittibhasana.
Exhale, legs to Bakasana position.
Inhale.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asanas.asana:
, Inhale, kneel down. Exhale, elbows down, forearms parallel on floor. Inhale, lift up to balance.
Exhale to chaturanga. Inhale, push up to upward dog. Exhale, push back to downward dog.

, Inhale, kneel down. Exhale, elbows down, forearms parallel on floor. Inhale, lift up to pincha mayurasana. Exhale, fold legs to padmasana, lower to chest.
Inhale, extend back to Pincha Mayurasana. Exhale to chaturanga. Inhale, push up to upward dog. Exhale, push back to downward dog. Inhale, jump to standing, head up. Exhale, forward fold. Samastitih.

asana.name: Mayurasana
asana.step: Inhale, feet shoulder width.
Exhale, hands between feet, fingers to back, head up.
Inhale, head stays lifted.
Exhale, head between arms.
Inhale, head up again.
Exhale, jump back, balance weight on elbows.
Inhale, hold mayurasana position.
Exhale.
Inhale, feet on floor push to upward dog (hands stay reversed)
Exhale, push back to downward dog (hands stay reversed)
Inhale, jump to standing (hands stay reversed), head up.
Exhale, forward fold, hands reversed.
Samastitih.

asana.name: Nakrasana
asana.step: Inhale, hands up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, jump back to Chaturanga, close your feet.
Hop forward, One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
Hop back, One.
Two.
Three.
Four.
Five.
Inhale, push to upward dog.
Exhale to downward dog.
Inhale, jump to half-standing, head up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Samastitih.

asana.name: Vatayanasana
asana.step: Inhale, right leg to half lotus bind, standing.
Exhale, both hands to mat.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, jump back, right leg in lotus.
Inhale, push up to upward dog, right leg in lotus.
Exhale, push back to downward dog, right leg in lotus.
Jump, to one leg standing.
Exhale, lower, left foot points out, right knee to floor, right arm over left, raise them.
Inhale, lift up to standing forward fold, right leg in lotus.
Exhale, jump to chaturanga, right leg in lotus.
Inhale, push to upward dog, right leg in lotus.
Exhale, push back to downward dog, right leg in lotus.
Inhale, right foot to floor.
Exhale, left leg in lotus.
Jump to half standing, left leg in lotus.
Exhale, lower, right foot points out, left knee to floor, left arm over right, raise them.
Inhale, lift up, left leg in lotus.
Exhale to chaturanga, left leg in lotus.
Inhale, push up to upward dog, left leg in lotus.
Exhale, push back to downward dog, left leg in lotus.
Inhale, jump to half standing, left leg in lotus.
Exhale, lower head to shin, left leg in lotus.
Inhale, straighten back, head up, left leg in lotus.
Exhale, left arm behind back, grab left foot.
Inhale. straighten, left foot in lotus, right arm up.
Exhale, lower leg and arm.
Samastitih.

asana.name: Parighasana
asana.step: Inhale, arms up.
Exhale, fold forward.
Inhale, head up.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump forward legs up.
Exhale, bend right leg, left leg straight to side.
Inhale, left hand to right knee, right hand over head to right foot.
Exhale, left hand grabs inside of left foot.
Inhale, sit up, hands to waist.
Exhale, hands to floor, lift.
Inhale, legs up, balance on arms.
Exhale to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump forward legs up.
Exhale, bend left leg, right leg straight to side.
Inhale, right hand to left knee, left hand over head to left foot.
Exhale, right hand grabs inside of right foot.
Inhale, sit up, hands to waist.
Exhale, hands to floor, lift.
Inhale, legs up, balance on arms.
Exhale, jump back to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asanas.asana:
Inhale, jump forward. Exhale, right knee over left, hands around right knee, chin down.
Inhale, right arm up, left arm down, clasp hands behind back. Exhale. , hands to floor Inhale, lift up on straight arms, legs up. Exhale to chaturanga. Inhale, push up to upward dog. Exhale, push back to downward dog. Inhale, jump forward on straight arms, legs up. Exhale, left knee over right, hands around left knee, chin down.
Inhale, left arm up, right arm down, clasp hands behind back.
Exhale, hands to floor Inhale, lift up on straight arms, legs up. Exhale, jump back to chaturanga. Inhale, push up to upward dog. Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Supta Urdhva Pada Vajrasana
asana.step: Inhale jump through, lay down.
Inhale, lift both legs to Halasana.
Exhale, right leg lotus, right hand bind, left hand grabs left big toe.
Inhale, roll up, balance.
Exhale, bend left leg next to left hip.
Inhale, bring left hand under right knee, turn to right.
Exhale, turn back to center, hands on floor.
Inhale, lift up, balance on straight arms.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, swing through, lie down.
Inhale, lift both legs to Halasana.
Exhale, left leg lotus, left hand bind, right hand grabs right big toe.
Inhale, roll up and balance.
Exhale, bend right leg next to right hip.
Inhale, bring right hand under left knee, turn to left.
Exhale, turn back to center, hands on floor.
Inhale, lift up, balance on straight arms.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Mukta Hasta Sirsasana A
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands in tripod, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Mukta Hasta Sirsasana B
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands toward front, palms up, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Mukta Hasta Sirsasana C
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands palms down to side, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asanas.asana:
, Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms. Exhale, kneel down, set hands, cup back of head, place head on floor, pike with straight legs. Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga. Inhale, push up to upward dog. Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Baddha Hasta Sirsansa B
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands, grasp elbows, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Baddha Hasta Sirsansa C
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands, arms parallel, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.

asana.name: Baddha Hasta Sirsansa D
asana.step: Inhale, jump forward balancing on straight arms.
Exhale, kneel down, set hands, elbows on floor, place head on floor, pike with straight legs.
Inhale, lift straight legs.
Exhale, lower to chaturanga.
Inhale, push up to upward dog.
Exhale, push back to downward dog.
